reviews.review_msg: Probably the worst class I ever took. Dismissive and rude to the point I went to the dean of UBCs GRSJ about him. Easy marks though if you can sit through his uninformed rants.

Awful class. Offensive about sensitive issues such as gender identities and would show movies with trigger scenes without telling anyone what they were going to be watching. No books were read, he just showed youtube clips and told us his opinions about topics that had no real relation to the course
